Name: Container.Tab
LongDesc: The Container.Tab method provides a tabbed interface for the Container plugin. It allows dynamic addition, removal, and disabling of tabs, and supports both horizontal and vertical layouts. Each tab can contain custom content.
Example: var container = Q.Container(); var tabs = container.Tab([{title: 'Tab 1', value: 'tab1', content: 'Content 1'}, {title: 'Tab 2', value: 'tab2', content: 'Content 2'}]);
